location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Donald Robertson, Beawar to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter informing Pelly that he may have trouble getting through the Diwer Pass to Dasswii and suggesting he use the direct route to Udepur [Udaipur] instead, as well as informing him that the roads were being prepared for his carriage and describing the landmarks he would be able to see on the direct route.The letter goes on to inform Pelly of his expected date of arrival in Nassirabad [Nasīrābād] and asking if he can return to Beawar in Pelly's carriage, otherwise other arrangements would have to be made.
